name: Business of Loving
description: A NSFW visual novel of love, lust and getting down to business. You play as a young, unpaid intern trying to make it in the biggest company in the city, Business Inc! You'll not only have to balance your life dealing with your grueling boss Kimberly, you'll have to balance home life with your single-mother roommate Lorraine as well as find other part time jobs with various other bosses to pay rent on time. Along with that, uncover a scandal of dirty lies and kinky corruption as you slowly make your way to the top of the business empire!​
